an2.32:1: "Asappurisabhūmiñca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sappurisabhūmiñca. Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha. Bhāsissāmī"ti.
an2.32:2: "Katamā ca, bhikkhave, asappurisabhūmi? Asappuriso, bhikkhave, akataññū hoti akatavedī. Asabbhi hetaṁ, bhikkhave, upaññātaṁ yadidaṁ akataññutā akataveditā. Kevalā esā, bhikkhave, asappurisabhūmi yadidaṁ akataññutā akataveditā.
